title: Join Our Remote Team to Support Aussie Solar Businesses
salary: PHP 40,000 - 45,000 / month starting offer (can reach up to 50+K depending on experience)
job_overview:
Join Percy Productivity – Solar Admin Support Team

Percy Productivity is a trusted operations partner for solar, trade, and service-based businesses across Australia.

About the Role
We're looking for Virtual Assistants with hands-on solar admin experience to join our team. You’ll support Australian solar businesses using platforms like SimPro, Pylon, and job management tools.

This is a remote role, aligned with the Australian time zone (no graveyard shift!). Long-term opportunities available for the right candidates.

You’ll Be a Great Fit If You Have:

- Proven experience in the Australian solar industry

- Working knowledge of SimPro, Pylon, and STC platforms

- Experience with grid connection paperwork and post-installation admin

- Strong written and verbal English skills

- A proactive, organised, and independent approach to work

- Confidence using digital tools (Google Workspace, MS, Asana, CRMs, online portals)

Perks of Being Part of the Percy Crew:
- Remote work on Australian daylight hours—no night shifts!
- Access to the Percy Community App for team events, updates & support
- Private Job Board Access to roles with Aussie clients
- Priority placement in our trusted talent pool for future roles
- Performance rewards and regular recognition

We Believe Everyone Deserves Meaningful Work
We welcome applicants from all walks of life. If you have the skills, heart, and solar admin know-how, we want you on our team.
